channel.title: Rune Arsenal - Old school 2006 server
channel.description:
[size=36pt][b]Rune Arsenal[/b][/size]
[b]Rune Arsenal is a old school based runescape server, The game is a little bit remake of rs 2006. It's 100% economy based, You can earn money by doing skills or killing npc's.[/b]
At the moment i do not own a website / forum for the server. I'm still planning to do this, but first i wanna see if the server would recieve players before i start spending money. As i don't have a website you van only download our client. or play on rs-ps.
I really hope people might give this a try. I'm sure there might be bugs, but when a bug is found i will fix it. Also i did not finnish the server. I'm planning to add lots of more content to it.
[b]Media:[/b]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img266/3874/cannonrm.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img803/9158/clawsy.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img822/657/cookingg.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/4493/duelr.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img705/8018/duel2n.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img171/7746/firemak.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img850/6536/fishingl.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img651/9526/questzg.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img855/8393/shipe.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img163/3393/trainingv.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img405/4507/woodcut.png[/img]
[b]Links:[/b]
Client Download: http://uberhacking.net/client.jar Webclient Play on browser: http://google.com/play.php?server=Rune_Arsenal
[b]Don't worry about the "Uberhacking" this is my hacking form. Nothing bad.[/b]

item.title: Rune Arsenal - Old school 2006 server
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:8, topic:481249”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=599488.msg4214382#msg4214382 date=1360018427]
Name sucks.
Rune Arsenal > Rune Arsehole > Rune Asshole
[/quote]
loveing idiot… u_u[/quote]

I’m an idiot because you chose a name that sounds like ‘asshole’? Also an arsenal is a place to store military equipment/weapons… It sucks as a name.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Arsenal - Old school 2006 server
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Servers like this have a lot of competitors, there’s nothing I see in your advertisement that would make me want to join your server over other peoples. Try and making your server have something that stands out to the audience like quests for example.

Also iirc d claws weren’t out in 2006?

Read full topic

@vince127ha wrote:

[size=36pt]Rune Arsenal[/size]

Rune Arsenal is a old school based runescape server, The game is a little bit remake of rs 2006.
It’s 100% economy based, You can earn money by doing skills or killing npc’s.

At the moment i do not own a website / forum for the server. I’m still planning to do this, but first i wanna see if the server would recieve players before i start spending money. As i don’t have a website you van only download our client. or play on rs-ps.

I really hope people might give this a try. I’m sure there might be bugs, but when a bug is found i will fix it. Also i did not finnish the server. I’m planning to add lots of more content to it.
